item.title: 2022-02-13 Overhaul to YEA Organizing Table AirTable
item.description: 2022-02-13 Overhaul to YEA Organizing Table AirTable Heads up, I made a slight overhaul in the Organizing Team AirTable. Fall 2021 and Spring 2022 tables are combined and now all found under the “Organizing Team” tableâ€”you can click on the left panel to change views.

item.title: 2022-02-16 Reflecting on My Feelings About the Website Change in [[Effective Altruism|YEA]]
item.description: 2022-02-16 Reflecting on My Feelings About the Website Change in [[Effective Altruism|YEA]] When the media team meets (Lakshimi and other parts of organizing team), I would like to ask their preferences from an unbiased side-by-side comparison of our current and old website: which experience they enjoy more and look they prefer

item.title: [[2022-02-13]] Two Reasons to Justify YEA Community Building
item.description: [[2022-02-13]] Two Reasons to Justify YEA Community Building The justification lies in [[Counterfactual Reasoning]] and how much money there is compared to what we can do with the money

item.title: [[2022-02-05]] Letter to Eric Tu About [[Effective Altruism]] and [[YEA Fellowship]]
item.description: [[2022-02-05]] Letter to Eric Tu About [[Effective Altruism]] and [[YEA Fellowship]] Dear Eric, I am so sorry for the delay in this email; I was reaching out to past fellows and had realized this email had somehow slipped by me!

item.title: [[2021-11-21]] Letter to Hassaan About Black Swan, Climate Change, Nuclear Risk, [[Problem of Induction]]
item.description: [[2021-11-21]] Letter to Hassaan About Black Swan, Climate Change, Nuclear Risk, [[Problem of Induction]] Dear Hassaan, Thank you so much for your reading responses!

item.title: [[2021-11-02]] Messages to Facilitators who had missed meetings
item.description: [[2021-11-02]] Messages to Facilitators Who Had Missed Meetings Hey __, how are you doing? I just wanted to check in if you saw my message in # fellowship-fall-21 and you can make our fellowship session Thursday.

item.title: [[2021-10-30]] Letter to Effective Altruism about Meeting Burnout
item.description: [[2021-10-30]] Letter to Effective Altruism About Meeting Burnout Written while [[2021-10-30 Studying with Carrie in the Franklin buttery, PGL, and our app works!

item.title: [[2021-10-13]] Huw's Comments For Me! Made Me Feel Very Good.
item.description: [[2021-10-13]] Huw’s Comments For Me! Made Me Feel Very Good. That’s awesome to hear RE the fellowship! Here are some quick reflections, for what they’re worth - definitely take with a grain of salt given it was under an hour of facetime )

item.title: [[2021-03-19]] Messages to [[Effective Altruism]] for Volunteer Opportunities
item.description: [[2021-03-19]] Messages to [[Effective Altruism]] for Volunteer Opportunities How I Can Help Would love to chat about any interesting opinions you have about EA, maximizing impact, and entrepreneurship.
